amendment.description: To appropriate $70,000,000 to identify and track hazardous materials shipments.

action.text: Amendment SA 1190 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1190.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1190 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1190 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 181.
Amendment SA 1190 ruled out of order by the chair.
